descriptionHTML:
Phi is an elegant analog Watch Face for Android Wear devices.


Features:

φ Designed for Round and Square Watches
φ 3 skins and 2 color themes
φ Watch battery indicator
φ Phone battery indicator
φ Date
φ Customization options


Options:
Phi Settings are accessible via the Android Wear Companion App on your phone. Simply select Phi and click on the Gear Icon to open the settings panel.

φ Skin selection
φ Second hand display
φ Date display
φ Low Bit Ambient mode

If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces+support@gmail.com.
We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users.



Made with love in Montreal♥
comments: Garbage Couldn't get to install on my Gear Live. Wasted money & time.
Best watch design! I love the sophisticated design and the orange colour scheme is my favourite.  Great work, I love it!
recentChanges: - Changed minimum Sdk version to support Android KitKat
- Low-bit ambient mode display bug fix
- New Gamma and Gamma Black skins
- Support for Low Bit Ambient mode (activated via the settings panel)
